665200.name: imos VR LOFT
665200.description: Virtual Reality for imos AG means not only technology, but also a modern visualization tool for sketching planning results, created with imos software. How imos technology can be integrated into the sales process as playfully, but nevertheless sales-promoting, it can also be integrated into the sales process, imos AG shows for the first time in the so-called "VR LOFT". The visitors are invited to take a look at the virtual experience and to marvel at the new possibilities.
665200.supported_languages:
英语*, 德语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
